content:
The code chunk defines properties and methods related to object transformations (position, rotation, scaling) during initialization. It sets start and end values for position, heading/rotation (HPR), quaternion rotation, and scale. This is part of a class that handles 3D object animations or transformations in a game engine or graphics library.

Context: The chunk belongs to an animation or transformation interval class, setting up initial and target states for object movements, rotations, or scaling over time.

self.startHpr = startHpr
            self.startQuat = startQuat
            self.endScale = scale
            self.startScale = startScale
            self.inPython = 1
        else:
            self.setEndPos(pos)
            if startPos is not None:
                self.setStartPos(startPos)
            self.setEndHpr(hpr)
            if startHpr is not None:
                self.setStartHpr(startHpr)
            if startQuat is not None:
                self.setStartQuat(startQuat)
            self.setEndScale(scale)
            if startScale is not None:
                self.setStartScale(startScale)
